We went to this bar three times during the trip in Taiwan.Perfect.

The cocktails are carefully prepared. The taste is delicious. It has both classic and signboards.I strongly recommend "Coffee Fantasy" and "Blossom Bloom".
They also have a variety of beer to choose from, suitable for everyone's taste (fruity beer, Potter beer, double/three times ipa ...)
The food is also very good.
This place itself is very comfortable, so that you feel the guests.
The staff is very friendly. When we told them that this was our last night, they even provided us with a round of shooting!
I hope I knew this bar before, and I would go there earlier!
